text:
+NeatNit Pikmin 1 is extremely good but short.
Pikmin 2 is my favourite and by far the longest to put it into perspective 
Pikmin 1 Speedrun 100% = 1:30:00
Pikmin 2 Speedrun 100% = 5:30:00
Pikmin 3 Speedrun 100% = 1:50:00

text: I have a feeling we will be getting a Pikmin 4 announcement pretty soon... E3 might be a good time. I haven't played #3 yet, but I heard it's very solid, unsuprisingly. I like this theme's variation between calm and powerful. Love the bells.

text: @SupraDarky I really like the scaling space like noise. The song reminded me of a mix between the Paper Mario TTYD and Mystery Dungeon series.
